title: The TRUTH About Fantasy WRs: Part 1 + Hitman & Hit Rates - Fantasy Football Podcast for 2/1
description:
The Super Bowl teams are set and the Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode! On today’s fantasy football podcast, reactions to the exciting Conference Championship games, and a deep dive into the top-tier WRs from the 2021 fantasy football season! Get the TRUTH behind the fantasy finish! Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for February 1st, 2022.

(3:45) - Conference Championship Reactions
(13:55) - NFL News, Tom Brady retirement?
(21:10) - The TRUTH About Fantasy WRs: Part 1
(22:05) - Cooper Kupp
(25:30) - Deebo Samuel
(28:35) - Davante Adams
(31:30) - Justin Jefferson
(34:25) - Ja’Marr Chase and Tee Higgins
(38:05) - Tyreek Hill
(44:05) - Stefon Diggs
(48:50) - Mike Evans and Chris Godwin
(54:40) - Diontae Johnson
(59:40) - Mike Williams and Keenan Allen

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
